The TL is awful, so bad that you'd just want to puke from the very first page; but still, it allows you to understand the gist of the story. This manga is not bad for a starting new doujinshi artist on a popular anime that has barely any doujin. At least, the whole story had a simple coherent plot from start to finish with a harem ending, which is totally a plus for me, and I can assume the original writing was decent and easy to follow just from the interactions between characters. I give this a thumbs up.
@itzki soyoki For me I think it's fine I course it's not the best I seen but I give you a 7.5/10 For Four girls That I like
